channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I’ve been testing digital photo frames for years, and I've just found my favorite design – Pexar’s innovative rear-lit stunner
item.description: The Pexar digital photo frame has become one of my personal faves, thanks to its gorgeous build and innovative lighting.

item.title: ‘Imagine a Cube Floating in the Air’: The New AI Dream Allegedly Driving Yann LeCun Away from Meta
item.description: The legendary AI scientist is reportedly leaving Meta. Here's what we know about why.

item.title: Tim Cook could step down as Apple CEO next year
item.description: According to the Financial Times, Tim Cook could step down as Apple CEO as early as next year. And the board has started to seriously work out a succession plan. FT says that John Ternus, Apple’s senior vice-president of hardware engineering, is considered the frontrunner for the position. Cook, who turned 65 recently, has been […]

item.title: Forget Valve's new Steam Machine: here are 5 mini PCs under $500 that can run SteamOS, play games and stream media
item.description: Forget Valve's new Steam Machine, these five mini PCs under $500 can run SteamOS and more.

item.title: The Next ‘Jumanji’ Movie is Becoming a Franchise Reunion
item.description: Rhys Darby, Danny DeVito, and more 'Jumanji' alums are coming back to help bring the franchise to a close.

item.title: Guerre des étoiles « made in France », épisode II : la danse infernale de Toutatis
item.description: C’est un duo de satellites français qui va jouer au chat et à la souris dans l’espace ! C’est une des futures missions les plus emblématiques de la nouvelle stratégie spatiale militaire française. La mission Toutatis a l’important objectif de préparer l’armée française à défendre ses satellites...

item.title: 700 km d’autonomie pour la Tesla Model Y, les batteries de BYD, et le moteur électrique Renault : les gros bouleversements électriques de la semaine – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Cette semaine, l'actualité automobile et vélo électrique a été riche. Les géants comme Renault, Tesla ou encore BYD ont dévoilé des nouveautés ambitieuses, pendant que certains acteurs comme Giant ou Eurobike tentent de sortir tant bien que mal des zones de turbulences. Voici les articles les plus lus sur Survoltés.

item.title: These Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones 31% off this weekend and selling fast
item.description: Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are on sale for $131 off this weekend.

item.title: This De’Longhi Combination Coffee Maker Espresso Machine turns your kitchen into your favorite coffee shop (and it’s on sale)
item.description: This De’Longhi Combination Coffee Maker Espresso Machine is on sale this weekend
